title: Linear momentum change in two object collision

Object <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="Uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>M</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> travels toward object <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of mass <math alttext="2 times uppercase M" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>2M</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> in such a way that they collide. The table contains data about the velocities of object <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and object <math alttext="Y " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> immediately before the collision and immediately after the collision. What are the change in momentum of the two-object system and the change in momentum of each object from immediately before the collision to immediately after the collision?

choices.label: Change in Momentum of the System Change in Momentum of Object <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Change in Momentum of Object <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Zero <math alttext="the negative fraction 10 times uppercase M v sub 0 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>M</mi><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="the fraction 10 times uppercase M v sub 0 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>M</mi><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
